name: Dash Fleet
description:
Dash Fleet is a simple and fun dashing action game.
Make your character dash left or right by clicking left or right mouse button, and fly through various obstacles. Collect coins that can help your progress, and earn achievements for a great performance.Features:
  • Dashing action game
  • Test your skills and reflexes by avoiding deadly totems
  • Multiple playable characters (more to come)
  • Minimalist pixel art design
  • Relaxing music
  • Never ending fun
